panels.description: The main dashboard of PadoGrid GemFire Dashboards (PHD) that resembles the main dashboard of GemFire Management Center (HMC). PHD includes additional metrics that are not available in HMC and vice versa. PHD exposes a finer degree of individual metric details along with federated cluster views making it more suitable for monitoring production systems.

options.content:
## Main

- [Main Dashboard](/d/ed5d1905-d13d-446a-83d5-3d33d3aadddc/00main?var-DataSource=$DataSource&var-Cluster=$Cluster&${__url_time_range})
- [Dual Main Dashboard](/d/2f6503d9-5b23-4af6-9a87-08f799229df5/00dual-main?var-DataSource=$DataSource&var-Cluster=$Cluster&var-Cluster2=$Cluster2&${__url_time_range})
- [All Main Dashboard](/d/5a076038-1d97-4c44-abe7-26020351d90b/00main-all?${__url_time_range})
